thread.title: German mayoral candidate stabbed in neck in ‘racist political’ attack
thread.title_full: German mayoral candidate stabbed in neck in ‘racist political’ attack

title: German mayoral candidate stabbed in neck in ‘racist political’ attack
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now German mayoral candidate stabbed in neck in ‘racist political’ attack Cologne Jennifer Morris Last updated at 5:25PM, October 17 2015 The attack is being described by police as “racist political” and linked to the migrant crisis 
A German mayoral candidate was stabbed in the neck today in what is being described by police as a “racist political” attack linked to the migrant crisis. 
Henriette Reker, who is active in helping refugees, has been left seriously wounded by the attack in the western city of Cologne but is described as being in a stable condition. 
Chancellor Angela Merkel has expressed her “shock” over the stabbing which took place in an atmosphere of growing tension in Germany. 
Mrs Merkel’s open-door policy towards Syrian refugees has faced a backlash from her conservative allies and seen a growing number protests Subscribe now 
To see the full article you need to subscribe Subscribe
